type: Legendary Creature – Dragon Shapeshifter Demigod Noble
rules_text:
Menace
[i]King of the Dragon Laguz[/i] – Other Dragons you control get +1/+1 and have menace.
[i]Night Tide[/i] – Whenever Dheginsea, King of Goldoa attacks, put two -1/-1 counters onto target creature defending player controls.
[i]Ire[/i] – Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, if it has less power than its base power, its controller loses life equal to the difference.
